description: Kamamoto Hideo is one of the unfortunates on whom http://anidb.net/ch25535 [Sushi Neko] aka Nekota-san is foisted as a teacher. Since his parents are too old, he has to take care of the family store and hence has to drop out of high school. Rather than supporting him, Sushi Neko abuses him and drives him into becoming an old-fashioned high-school thug, with painful consequences.
name: Kamamoto Hideo
